text: Todd Woodbridge and Mark Woodforde were the defending champions but only Woodbridge competed that year with Jonas Björkman. Björkman and Woodbridge won in the final 7-6(7-2), 3-6, 6-3 against Daniel Nestor and Sandon Stolle. ==Seeds== Champion seeds are indicated in bold text while text in italics indicates the round in which those seeds were eliminated. ==Draw== ===Final=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==External links== * 2001 Hamburg Masters Doubles Draw Category:Hamburg European Open Category:2001 ATP Tour
title: 2001 Hamburg Masters – Doubles
